title: App crash when tap 'Send message' in user profile opened from group chat info view

labels.name: core-ui-grooming
labels.description: To be reviewed on the next core ui grooming to add the issue to team board and set priority

body: ***Type***: Bug *Summary*: App crashes with `TypeError: null is no an object (evaluating 'b.g')` when navigation to 1-1 with user should happen upon 'Send message' tap in user profile which was opened from Group Chat info screen. #### Expected behavior 1-1 chat view opened #### Actual behavior App crashed with `TypeError: null is no an object (evaluating 'b.g')` ### Reproduction - Open Status and create new account - Add any contact in contact list - Create group chat with this contact - Navigate to Group chat view - Tap top-right `menu` button -> `Group info` -> three-dots next to group chat member -> `View profile` - Tap `Send message` ### Additional Information - Status version: Develop nightly (2019090203) - Operating System: Android and iOS #### Logs [comment]: # (if on Android please replicate bug whilst running adb logcat) ``` 09-02 18:12:25.833 14576 14626 E ReactNativeJS: TypeError: null is not an object (evaluating 'b.g') 09-02 18:12:25.833 14576 14626 E
